special_text:
[+1:]: Create an Ether Cylinder token. Draw a card, then discard a card.
[-2:]: Target artifact becomes a 4/4 artifact creature until your next turn.
[-7:]: Creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn where X is the number of artifacts you control
notes: 2.2.0: Improved the +1 to make the card more impactful. and buffed the artifact creature.
